item.spell_engine.scroll.table_hint: Add to Spell Book using Spell Binding Table
tutorial.spell_hotbar.title: Focus Spell Hotbar
spell.spell_engine.use_item.name: Use Item
spell.spell_engine.use_item.description: Use one of the held items.
spell.spell_engine.use_offhand_item.name: Use Offhand Item
spell.tooltip.spell_binding_tip: (Use Spell Binding Table to add spells)
text.autoconfig.spell_engine.title: Spell Engine
text.autoconfig.spell_engine.option.clie: High luminance beams
Render spell beams with high luminance, for better spectacular visual effects
Hold to cast CHANNELLED spells
This applies for channeled spells only! If enabled, the spell casting stops when releasing the key, otherwise when the key is pressed again
Hold to cast CHARGED spells
This applies for charged spells only! If enabled, the spell casting stops when releasing the key, otherwise when the key is pressed again
Auto swap Spear & Bow
Having a Spear and Bow in main and offhand, attack key will swap to the Spear, use key will swap to the Bow.
Hide offhand item on Spell Hotbar
When usable held item is shown on Spell Hotbar
Spell Hotbar Use key
When use key is free to use, use it for the first spell slot
Spell Hotbar Slot 1 fallback
Spell Hotbar Slot 1 to use the selected vanilla keybind, when unassigned in Options/Controls/Key Binds
Spell Hotbar Slot 2 fallback
Spell Hotbar Slot 1 to use the selected vanilla keybind, when unassigned in Options/Controls/Key Binds
Spell Hotbar Slot 3 fallback
Spell Hotbar Slot 3 to use the selected vanilla keybind, when unassigned in Options/Controls/Key Binds
Spell Hotbar Slot 4 fallback
Spell Hotbar Slot 4 to use the selected vanilla keybind, when unassigned in Options/Controls/Key Binds
Spell Hotbar Slot 5 fallback
Spell Hotbar Slot 5 to use the selected vanilla keybind, when unassigned in Options/Controls/Key Binds
Spell Hotbar Slot 6 fallback
Spell Hotbar Slot 6 to use the selected vanilla keybind, when unassigned in Options/Controls/Key Binds
Spell Hotbar Slot 7 fallback
Spell Hotbar Slot 7 to use the selected vanilla keybind, when unassigned in Options/Controls/Key Binds
Spell Hotbar Slot 8 fallback
Spell Hotbar Slot 8 to use the selected vanilla keybind, when unassigned in Options/Controls/Key Binds
Spell Hotbar Slot 9 fallback
Spell Hotbar Slot 9 to use the selected vanilla keybind, when unassigned in Options/Controls/Key Binds
Sneaking bypasses Spell Hotbar
If enabled, sneak to use shield with an active Spell Hotbar
Prioritize casting spell for 'use' keybind
Spell on the 'use' keybind will try to cast spells before interacting blocks and entities
Show target name when multiple
Show target name when more than one entity is being targeted
Highlight target
Render glowing effect on targeted entity
Filter invalid targets
Prevent targeting allies with hostile spells, enemies with helpful spells
Always show full spell tooltip
Show all spell details on item tooltips, without having to press a button
Spell Binding hint
Show Spell Binding Table hint to tooltip of empty staves
Spell Book support hint
Weapons tooltips show `Casts spells from equipped Spell Book`
Spell cast error messages
Show error message on HUD about the failure of spell cast attempts
Shoulder Surfing bow-like behaviour
Allow Shoulder Surfing Adaptive cursor for spell caster items, only while casting spells
First-person player animations
Spell casting player animations to be shown. Only recommended to change if custom camera mods in use.
